doc.field: - Philip Crosby Associates Inc said its fourth quarter and annual earnings report will be delayed two more weeks. The company cited the recent in-house embezzlement and a subsequent review by auditors of its international situation as reason for the delay. Philip Crosby, however, said it believes its December estimate calling for earnings per share between 10 cts and 15 cts, on revenues of 11 mln dlrs, was still valid.
